longIntro1: I am a mechanical engineer, a social media content creator and recently transited into a full stack developer. I am a natural fast-learner, always eager to explore new technologies and approaches to problem-solving. Also, I am a creative person, who can always think outside the box. I am always seeking new and innovative ways to approach challenges, and am skilled at identifying effective solutions that others might overlook. This unique perspective has enabled me to achieve great success as a full stack developer, where I am able to design and develop websites and systems that are both intuitive and functional.
longIntro2: In my spare time, I keen to do the handcrafts, play the piano, play video games and take care my baby dog.
shortIntro: A full stack developer in transition from mechanical engineer, driven by my passion for creativity, problem-solving, and collaboration.
